org.springframework.test.web.servlet.assertj.AbstractHttpServletRequestAssert<SELF, MockHttpServletRequest>

Type Parameters:
SELF - the type of assertions
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.assertj.core.api.Assert<SELF, MockHttpServletRequest>, org.assertj.core.api.Descriptable<SELF>, org.assertj.core.api.ExtensionPoints<SELF, MockHttpServletRequest>
public abstract class AbstractMockHttpServletRequestAssert<SELF extends AbstractMockHttpServletRequestAssert<SELF>> extends AbstractHttpServletRequestAssert<SELF, MockHttpServletRequest>
AssertJ assertions that can be applied to MockHttpServletRequest.
